description:
DOMUI: Two fixes to match the mocks for the Settings page.
* First nav-item should be 70px from the top.
* Each nav-item should be 30px tall.
* Gradient tweak to the selected navbar-item.

BUG=none
TEST=none

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=61703

messages.text:
http://codereview.chromium.org/3564013/diff/1/2
File chrome/browser/resources/options/options_page.css (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/3564013/diff/1/2#newcode9
chrome/browser/resources/options/options_page.css:9: padding-top: 1em;
Should we update the padding top too?

http://codereview.chromium.org/3564013/diff/1/2
File chrome/browser/resources/options/options_page.css (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/3564013/diff/1/2#newcode9
chrome/browser/resources/options/options_page.css:9: padding-top: 1em;
On 2010/10/05 23:26:24, arv wrote:
> Should we update the padding top too?

You mean convert it to the corresponding pixel value?

It just looks strange that one is in px and one in em

On 4:37 pm, jhawkins <jhawkins@chromium.org> wrote:
>> http://codereview.chromium.org/3564013/diff/1/2
>> File chrome/browser/resources/options/options_page.css (right):
>> http://codereview.chromium.org/3564013/diff/1/2#newcode9
>> chrome/browser/resources/options/options_page.css:9: padding-top: 1em;
>> On 2010/10/05 23:26:24, arv wrote:
>> Should we update the padding top too?

> You mean convert it to the corresponding pixel value?

http://codereview.chromium.org/3564013/diff/1/2
File chrome/browser/resources/options/options_page.css (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/3564013/diff/1/2#newcode9
chrome/browser/resources/options/options_page.css:9: padding-top: 1em;
On 2010/10/05 23:37:44, James Hawkins wrote:
> On 2010/10/05 23:26:24, arv wrote:
> > Should we update the padding top too?
> 
> You mean convert it to the corresponding pixel value?

Done.

subject: DOMUI: Two fixes to match the mocks for the Settings page.
